Reviews.Title: NO HARD DRIVE INCLUDED!!!
Reviews.Author: Joe M.
Reviews.Content: The description clearly states this unit comes with a hard drive however it "does not". I contacted the company directly. They stated they were aware of the listing and stated the listing has been removed. They also stated they "do not have control of the listing description". Really?!... This item is still being listed and sold!! Buyer Beware!!

ProductInfo.Name: 8Ch DVR H.264 LTS LTD2308SE CIF Realtime With 1.5 TB Hard Drive For Security Camera Pentaplex Mobile Phone (SuperCam Software APP Store)
